title: Start Your Contest
body: Complete our fast, easy project brief template, and weâ€™ll share it with our community of more than 70,000 Creatives

title: Ideas Start Pouring In
body: You will start receiving name ideas - created specifically for you - within minutes. Dozens of contestants work for you at the same time! A typical naming contest receives several hundred name ideas. All ideas are automatically checked for URL availability.

title: Collaborate and Communicate
body: See all your submissions from your contest dashboard. Rate entries, leave private comments, and send public messages, leading the process towards the perfect name.

title: Validate
body: Choose your name with confidence. Our unique validation process includes domain checks, trademark risk assessment, linguistics analysis, and professional audience testing.

title: Pick your winner!
body: Once your contest ends, announce the winner - and register the name. Come back to Squadhelp to launch a Logo Design or Tagline project for your name.
